title: The Edgar Winter Group - They Only Come Out at Night (1972) [EAC
description:
'They Only Come Out at Night' is one of Edgar Winter's most successful albums: No. 3 on the Billboard Pop Albums chart, including two single-hits, "Frankenstein" (#1 Pop Singles) and "Free Ride" (#14 Pop Singles).
